parameters.name: AccountId
parameters.description: The ID of the Alibaba Cloud account that corresponds to the member.

parameters.name: NewAccountType
parameters.description:
The new type of the member. Valid values:

*   ResourceAccount: resource account
*   CloudAccount: cloud account

>  You can configure either the `NewDisplayName` or `NewAccountType` parameter.

parameters.name: NewDisplayName
parameters.description:
The new display name of the member.

>  You can configure either the `NewDisplayName` or `NewAccountType` parameter.
